One night after a 41-point effort in Philadelphia's most lopsided win of the season, Allen Iverson scored an NBA season-high and career-best 54 in a 107-103 victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers. It was like he was playing horse tonight, said 76ers guard Aaron McKie , who had 20 points and nine assists. " Michael Jordan jumper was deadly." announced Thursday that co-founder Larry Page, pictured in 2007, would replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the Internet giant in April. Google said Eric Schmidt would remain with the company as executive chairman and focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. The firm's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will work on strategic projects and new products, Google said in a statement. It said the management changes would take effect on April 4.
